edu.cs495.engine.gfx.requests

Class ImageRequest

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.cs495.engine.gfx.requests.AbstractRequest
      • edu.cs495.engine.gfx.requests.ImageRequest
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<AbstractRequest>

    public class ImageRequest
extends AbstractRequest
    This is an AbstractRequest which will encapsulate an Image and where to draw it. This is sent to the renderer for processing.
    Version:
    February 2019
    Author:
    Spencer Imbleau
